content.p: We're always pleased to hear from alumni, whether it's a query, something in your life you want to update us on or just a hello! Our office is now based at King's Meadow Campus but we're primarily working remotely, so please contact us by email at alumni-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk, telephone +44 (0)115 823 2408, or write to us at: Campaign and Alumni Relations Office B50 CARO Team Zone King's Meadow Campus University of Nottingham Lenton Lane Nottingham NG7 2NR You can also try our FAQs to find answers to the most popular questions or use the simple form below to contact us. Don't miss out on our events, news and opportunities by sharing your contact details with us. Find answers to our most frequently asked questions.
